name: Jumpy Paws - World Adventures
description:
Run, jump, and bark your way through beautiful South American locations helping the adventurer puppy, Paws, reach their goals and complete their missions. Customize Paws' appearance with different colorful accessories and furs.

Join the adventure

Traverse more than 20 hand-crafted levels, solve simple puzzles, and help the puppy find their way to fulfill their objectives. Collect all special items to unlock mini-challenges and additional content.


Explore unique scenarios

Paws and their owner are traveling the world when adventure finds them. An iconic place from South America inspires each game world. Discover each level and be amazed by the natural beauty depicted in cartoony form. Face native enemies and obstacles and find your way through victory.

Put Paws' dog skill up to good use

Bark your enemies to distract them, dig up secret collectibles, and sniff to reveal mysterious passages. All the dog senses are welcome when it comes to revealing secrets and finding all the collectibles.


Breeds, hats, and more!

Customize Paws' appearance. Choose from a fun collection of hats, scarves, dog collars, sunglasses, and colorful breeds to make Paws as stylish as your own puppy.


Main Features

  • Family friendly cute game featuring a puppy
  • Short and sweet hand-crafted levels and mini-games
  • Unique scenarios portraying iconic places from South America
  • Simple puzzles to solve with dog skills and non-violent mechanics
  • Colorful customization to make Paws as unique as you want

No animals were harmed during the production of this game ;)
